snippet: Last February, James C. Woolery left investment banking to return to the practice of law. Less than a year later, he has been tapped to lead his new law firm.
abstract: Last February, James C. Woolery left investment banking to return to the practice of law. Less than a year later, he has been tapped to lead his new law firm.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Cadwalader Picks Woolery as Next Chairman
